title: Trump administration set to lift transgender bathroom guidelines | Chicago Sun-Times
text:
Chicago News 02/22/2017, 11:34am Trump administration set to lift transgender bathroom guidelines 
The Trump administration is set to lift federal transgender bathroom guidelines, a source tells The Associated Press. | AP file photo Sign-Up for our News & Politics Newsletter Sign-Up 
WASHINGTON â€” The Trump administration is set to lift federal transgender bathroom guidelines, sources tell The Associated Press. 
This is a developing story. Check back for updates. Previously from Chicago News
